title: Shapes and Patterns

vocab.definition: A round shape with no corners
A shape with 4 equal sides and 4 corners
A shape with 3 sides and 3 corners
Things that repeat in the same order

teachingNotes: Use shape manipulatives and real objects. Create patterns with colors, shapes, sounds. Practice identifying shapes in environment.

sample.question: What comes next in this pattern: circle, square, circle, square, _____?
How many sides does a triangle have?
Show me a shape with 4 equal sides.

truefalse.question: A circle has corners.
expectedAny: circles are round with no corners

truefalse.question: Patterns repeat in the same order.
You can make patterns with colors.

multiplechoice.question: How many corners does a square have?
What comes next: red, blue, red, blue, ____?
What pattern is this: big, small, big, small?
Which shape has the most sides?

fillintheblank.question: A _____ is round with no corners.
In the pattern ABC, ABC, the next group would be _____.
Red, blue, red, blue - this is a _____ pattern.
A _____ has 4 equal sides and 4 corners.
Circle, square, triangle - these are all _____.

circle has no sides, square has 4

shortanswer.question: Describe a pattern you can make with blocks.

wordProblems.question: You make a pattern with red, blue, red, blue blocks. What color comes next?
